movies.title: The White Haired Witch of Lunar Kingdom
movies.originalTitle: Bai fa mo nu zhuan zhi ming yue tian guo
movies.plot: In the twilight of the Ming Dynasty, the Imperial court is plagued by corruption as tyrants rule over the land. With the Manchurians preying on a weakened empire, war is imminent. To save the victims from their suffering, sorceress Jade Raksha fights the soldiers that oppress people for their own gain. As payback, local government officials decide to pin the murder of Governor Zhuo Zhonglian on Jade, turning her and the members of her cult into wanted fugitives for a crime they didn't commit.
movies.simplePlot: In the twilight of the Ming Dynasty, the Imperial court is plagued by corruption as tyrants rule over the land. With the Manchurians preying on a weakened empire, war is imminent. To save ...

biography.bio: Bingbing Fan was born 16 September 1981. She is a Chinese actress, television producer and pop singer. Fan rose to fame in Asia in 1998-1999 with the mega-hit TV series My Fair Princess. In 2003, she starred in Cell Phone, which became the highest-grossing Chinese film of the year, winning a Hundred Flowers Award. Since then she has received awards from the Golden Horse Film Festival and Awards, Eurasia International Film Festival, Tokyo International Film Festival, Beijing College Student Film Festival and Huading Awards for films like The Matrimony (2007), Lost in Beijing (2007), Buddha Mountain (2011) and Double Xposure (2012). Fan has participated in many foreign-language films, such as the French film Stretch (2011), the Korean film My Way (2011) and the Hollywood blockbuster X-Men: Days of Future Past (2014). She has also been called a fashion icon due to frequent appearances on the red carpet, movie premieres, and fashion shows. She topped the Forbes China Celebrity 100 list in 2013 and 2014, after ranking in the top 10 every year since 2006. In 2007 Fan left her management company Huayi Brothers to establish Fan Bingbing Studio. Since then she has produced TV series that she also starred in, and her TV show The Empress of China, believed to be the most expensive Chinese series in history.
biography.name: Bingbing Fan

biography.bio: Xiaoming Huang was born on November 13, 1977 in Qingdao, Shandong Province, China. He is an actor and producer, known for Ip Man 2 (2010), American Dreams in China (2013) and The Return of the Condor Heroes (2006). He has been married to Angelababy since May 27, 2015. They have one child.
biography.name: Xiaoming Huang

biography.bio: Wenzhuo Zhao was born on April 10, 1972 in Ning'an, Heilongjiang, China. He is an actor, known for True Legend (2010), The Blade (1995) and Green Snake (1993).
biography.name: Wenzhuo Zhao

biography.bio: Xuebing Wang was born on September 6, 1971 in Urumqi, Xinjiang, China. He is an actor, known for Black Coal (2014), The Silent War (2012) and The Lost Bladesman (2011). He has been married to Xuan Zhang since 2013. They have one child. He was previously married to Ning Sun and Yuqi Feng.
biography.name: Xuebing Wang

biography.bio: Shera Li is an actress, known for The White Haired Witch of Lunar Kingdom (2014), Confucius (2010) and The Break-Up Artist (2014).
biography.name: Shera Li

biography.bio: Dahong Ni is an actor, known for La cité interdite (2006), The Assassin (2015) and To Live (1994).
biography.name: Dahong Ni

biography.bio: Cheng-Hui Yu was born on August 16, 1939 in Penglai, Shandong, China. He is known for his work on Sword Identity (2011), Yellow River Fighter (1988) and The White Haired Witch of Lunar Kingdom (2014). He died on July 4, 2015 in Shandong Province, China.
biography.name: Cheng-Hui Yu

biography.bio: Xiang Dong Xu is known for his work on Dragon Blade (2015), La 14ème Lame (2010) and White Vengeance (2011).
biography.name: Xiang Dong Xu

biography.bio: Rongsheng Xiao is an actor, known for The White Haired Witch of Lunar Kingdom (2014), Deadly Melody (1994) and Yuan Shan De Hong Ye (2010).
biography.name: Rongsheng Xiao

biography.bio: Cecilia Yip was born on March 8, 1962 in Hong Kong as Si-Si Lee. She is an actress and producer, known for The Swordsman (1990), Hong Kong 1941 (1984) and Et là-bas, quelle heure est-il? (2001). She is married to Louis Tan.
biography.name: Cecilia Yip

biography.bio: Yao Tong was born on August 11, 1985 in Kunming, Yunnan, China. She is known for her work on Snowfall in Taipei (2009), The White Haired Witch of Lunar Kingdom (2014) and Zao Jian, Wan Ai (2013).
biography.name: Yao Tong

biography.bio: Yikuan Yan was born on January 24, 1979 in Shanghai, China. He is an actor, known for The Glamorous Imperial Concubine (2011), The White Haired Witch of Lunar Kingdom (2014) and L.O.R.D: Legend of Ravaging Dynasties (2016). He has been married to Ruoxi Du since August 2013.
biography.name: Yikuan Yan

biography.bio: Jian Xue is known for his work on Dragon Gate, La légende des sabres volants (2011), The White Haired Witch of Lunar Kingdom (2014) and Invisible Target (2007).
biography.name: Jian Xue

camera: Red Epic, Zeiss Ultra Prime, Fujinon Alura and Angenieux Optimo Lenses
